name: 4711 Eau de Cologne
copy: You really ought to try a quick massage with 4711 Eau de Cologne, after the morning batin. It makes you feel gloriously fin for the rest of the day. I know it sounds extravagant, but really it's worth it, only you must ask for 4711-it is a bottle with the Blue and Gold Gabel. I've just finished a Aong cross country run and Jam due for a big dance to-night and I'm feeling splendid.

name: 4711 Eau de Cologne
copy: Archives How to keep dainty and attractive rough out the activities of the long, hot summer days how to allay the ugly flush of sunburn. Use 4711 This Eau de Cologne contains all the requisites for helping women to retain their loveliness and charm on all occasions. A few drops of 4711 in the wash basin or bath, morning and evening, will lay the foundation for the health and beauty of your skin during the coming vagaries of summer's heat. Be sure you get the genuine, you can tell it by the Blue and Gold Label.

name: Mennen
copy: You interest me - 'cause... I like SMOOTH Men WHO KEEPS PRESENTABLE LONGER

name: Carry her heart away with fragrance by Coty
copy: Carry her heart away with fragrance by Coty. These classic Coty fragrances L'Aimant, L'Origan, Emeraude, and Paris -have inspired a series of smart gift sets, ranging from $55 to $2.25.

name: Emeraude the Jewel Fragrance
copy: Most hauntingly mysterious of jewels is the emerald... whose subtle green fire inspired Emeraude. Let this glow-ing perfume scent your day... in Emeraude Accessories.

name: Fragrance
copy: If you have once spent a season in London, you will, forever after, remember that brilliant pageant the beautiful women, the jewels, and the perfumes. And in this very set-ting, Yardley's Fragrance made its debut, a modern, intriguing perfume for the formal evening scene. Pleased with its London success, we brought it to America... and American women have loved it too. There's also a face powder, Fragrance, as perfect as the perfume. We make it in six shades, including our own ex-clusive English Peach, a new rachel with a warm glow, and put it in a green and silver box that enraptures our eyes anew every day. Then, for confirmed sybarites, we hasten to add that bath salts, dust-ing powder, rouge, tale and a com pact in the Fragrance odour are also among those present.

name: Bouquet Lentheric
copy: BOUQUET LENTHERIC the daytime fragrance. Lenthérie Bouquet with MIRACLE Scent In all fragrances, including: Shanghai, Number Twelve, Tahitian Gardenia, As Phodèle, Golden Lotus, Carnation. Bottles, from $1.00. Decanters, from $1.75.

name: Fragrance
copy: HER GOWN-her wrap-her jewels may be reported in international society columns. the night after you've seen her dancing in London's smartest hideaway. But you will find never a word of the aura of glamour that surrounded her. Perhaps, because such matters are too subtle entirely for the mundane pen. Time and again in these Mayfair rendez-vous you've been conscious of that sudden catching breath of brilliance an elusive sparkle that seemed to characterize some lovely creature as poignant, beautiful, wist-fully perfect and divinely gay. That's when you recognized the spell of Yardley's formal Fragrance perfume. And made a note to trace it down and have it for your own some day. Now you need not go to London to surround yourself with this charmingly sophisticated brilliance. For now America has Fragrance by Yard-ley, London's smartest perfume also. As well as Fragrance powder, a great perfumer's contribution to your skin's per-petual radiance. (In subtle colors, it is soft and very lasting.) Will you go on explor-ing... and have the bath salts, and pow-der, tale, compact in the same entrancing fragrance? If you're perfectionist enough, it's what you're bound to so we've placed them all (at no great price) nearby at your disposall At any fine cosmetics counter for sparkling occasions when you want to sparkle tool

name: Gemey
copy: Fly with the spirit of Christmas as it speeds on its merry way to Nassau or Nice or Naples, to Paris or far Bombay. Look for the loveliest women, the perfume they adore. It's gay and young and joyous... it's fragrance Gemey. Fragrance Gemey, her choice for Christmas me world around! Fragrance Gemey, now presented in America by Richard Hudnut in distinguished glamour gifts. Here are casual trifles for the toe of her stock-ing, intimate enchantments for her skin, her hair, charm chests of alluring luxury. Through them all suns this single thread of fragrance. It's flattery, it's sorcery, it's the gay, Continental way to say Merry Christmas... the gift that's welcome the world around... fragrance Gemeyl

name: Yanky Clover
copy: Yanky Clover Blooms in New Packages. They're the gayest, prettiest packages. the new dress-up wrappings for Yanky Clover! Wrappings with the same light-hearted lilt of an old-time folk tune... the meadow-sweet, nostalgic breath of new-mown fields that's made Yanky Clover one of America's best-loved fragrances. Perfume...toilet water...dusting powder, $1 each...

name: Lentheric
copy: Chese fragrant persuasions. For those who seeks gifts that speak a tender message. Which breathes her charm? Which dares your tribute with a gesture frankly romantic? Shall it be Miracle, Asphodèle, Le Pirate, or Forêt Vierge? A lovely queen of Europe chooses Miracle, a parfum ...exquisite... frankly feminine and alluring. For her who is lithe and wears her clothes with inef-fable grace-Asphodèle. It is the gardenia as the poet would immortalize it were he a master-perfumer. Does your gift list include one who is capricious?.. Le Pirate is for her. For it captivates with spring-like daring! But to her whom you see in the rhythms of sport clothes, give Forêt Vierge.. a joyous lilt for modern Dianas!

name: Gardenia
copy: No other perfumer knows the s the secret of Chanel's perfume they have the of true, mellow, rich scent of freshly cut flowers... In this lovely month of May... with flowers everywhere... under the brim of your chapeau... in your corsage...on the lapel of your suit... in your garden... the heavy scents of winter are forgotten ... For Chanel it's always spring ... No one can equal her clinging, delicate Gardenia... her fragrant, heady Jasmin... they'll give you brio, chic... lift you to your toes, like a bubbling glass of Champagne..

name: Gardenia, Glamour, No.5
copy: For those hours when you would play the role of Ro-mance when allure is of first importance-wear the new GLAMOUR by CHANEL. A-ahl Tonight you would be elusive, fragile as a Dresden figure elegantly enchant-ing-wear GARDENIA by CHANEL. And when your mood prompts you to make the grand entrance to take the breath away. in the grand manner-wear No. 5

name: Glamour
copy: Chanel learned style conventions first, and then broke them gayly. That is glamour. Her perfume, Glamour, smiles a Mona Lisa smile and offers to show you another of the ways of the bright world. It is emotional, but strictly fashionable as a Chanel Gown.

name: New Oriental Lime
copy: Use too much and you can find yourself in a tight squeeze. Limes are for squeezing. So you can imagine what can happen to you now that Hai Karate® After Shave and Cologne come in a potent lime scent. Your girl can get carried away. And do squeezy things to you. That's why we have to put instructions on self defense in every package. Just like we do in regular Hai Karate. And, best of all, limes are also for cooling. So Hai Karate Oriental Lime's breezy feeling will help you stay cool through practically anything.

name: The Magnet
copy: Beauty is your discipline, your cold hard won perfection. Perfume is your warming fire. It brings to life the woman in you. Of all the great French perfumes, L'Aimant is the most feminine. It gives itself to you. It changes as you change. L'Aimant is not a dress, worn today and put aside tomorrow. It is your constant self.e

copy: Be divinely Irresistible... be the star of his heart to-night with Irresistible Perfume... A touch on your wrists, your throat and your petite evening muff and you be-come a more thrilling person to yourself, and to him. Teasing... provocative... irresistible. Discover the exciting new confidence that Irresistible Perfume gives you. Tonight, try Irresistible Perfume. You'll be sparkling, electric, ready to conquer the world and the man! To be completely ravishing use all of the Irresistible Beauty Aids. Certified pure, laboratory tested and approved.

name: Irresistable
copy: You can’t buy love but you can buy and be Irresistible. Like a Parisienne, you can set hearts on fire if se the French women never neglect an exciting, seductive perfume. Such is IRRESISTIBLE PERFUME. This mysteriously exotic fragrance stirs senses...thrills...awakens love. It makes you divinely exciting, glamorous, utterly irresistible.

name: Atkinsons Eau de Cologne
copy: WE ARE NOT SATISFIED if we do not tread on gems in our baths. Such was the luxury of the Romans. These days, few of us can boast a jewelled bath, but there is still a luxury of the bath which we can all enjoy. NOTHING is more luxurious, more infinitely refreshing after any form exercise that a bath to which has been added just a little of Atkinsons Eau de Cologne.

name: djier kiss
copy: DJER-KISS SO EXQUISITE BECAUSE IT'S SO FRENCH. Manfield Maxfield Parrish in this beautiful painting pictures the spirit of Djer Kiss-a breath of mountain air-the fragrance of blossoms. Djer Kiss that most engagingly French of perfumes, created by the great Parisian modernist, Kerkeft himself. There is no perfume quite like that of Dyer Kiss-for there is none with quite its fragrance of individuality-none with quite its appeal to those who are both particular.
Wealthy, elegant, wildly seductive. The sexiest women in Beverly Hills have Fred Hayman's number 273.

copy: WANTED in a world of men. Cool, poised, compelling. In a world of men she's irresistible. For her, perfume does more than diamonds ever could. Yet her secret is simple. Her cream perfume, her liquid perfume & solid perfume, her bath cubes & talcum powder are all from one of the matched perfume ranges by Potter & Moore

copy: She's always certain OF ROMANCE. Evening in Paris Powder gives her skin a soft and youthful finish that is irresistible. Evening in Paris Perfume surrounds her with a lingering fragrance which never fails to attract.

name: Command Performance
copy: helena rubinstein launches her first great French fragrance: Command performance. Like sudden radiance spotlighting you-this romantic new fragrance by Helena Rubinstein. Piquant as the breath of a dew-fresh nosegay. Winy...warming...as love-at-first-glance.

name: Cachet
copy: A thousand girls can wear it. It won't be the same on any two. A fragrance as individual as you are.

name: Cachet
copy: THE PERFUME NO TWO WOMEN CAN SHARE. Cachet is different on every woman who wears it. You see, the moment it touches your body, Cachet blends with your own special chemistry. And suddenly, it's you. Other women may wear Cachet, but you make it yours alone.

name: Tosca
copy: There is magic in the nature of women - delicate and full of charm like the scent of youthful grace

name: Irresistable
copy: There are women who invite Romance as naturally as flowers invite the enjoyment of their perfume. You envy them, perhaps. For you, too, want Romance. But do you invite it? Do your lips lure? Your eyes promise? Your skin, your hair, your very fragrance... do these invite caresses? Irresistible Beauty Aids are an irresistible invitation to Ro-mance. The satin-smoothness of Irresistible Powder, the soft blush of Irresistible Rouge, the seductive coloring and creamy indelibility of Irresistible Lip Lure these speak the language of allure. Final touch, IRRESISTIBLE PERFUME, romantic as the first flowers he sent you.

name: Prince Matchabelli
copy: Once there was a prince... He was a prince of royal blood, with a most unusual hobby, perfume! He created individual scents to dramatize the personalities of many notable women throughout the world. And, so well-known did these perfumes become, that he soon made his pleasure his business. The royal crown bottle inspired by his family crest still symbolizes Prince Matchabelli's royal family of fine fragrances... haunting Stradivari...adventurous Wind Song... romantic Beloved... exciting Added Attraction... and luxurious Abano. Each year these exciting fragrances are presented in a new and festive collection of fine gifts for you to give...or receive. See them now... from $1 to $45. And remember...especially at Christmas...every woman deserves a crown!

name: Sunflower
copy: Sunflowers, a celebration of life

name: Nuance
copy: If you want to capture someone's attention, whisper. An exquisitely delicate new fragrance that lasts and lasts. like a whisper is impossible to resist.

name: Lilac Time
copy: Lilac Time, captivating new perfume by Houbigant, is more than a fragrance-it's the mood of the moment enchantingly feminine, delightfully romantic, lingering as a long-remembered melody,

name: Houbigant
copy: She who seems to make no effort SHE to attract is ever the most charm-ing. Yet modern charm is a thing of art as well as nature, and could one but know the care that goes into achieving careless engaging poise, it would be revealed that every detail of appearance-even perfume is chosen with the utmost discrimination.
